portfolio.title: Successful

featured.title: Featured Projects
featured.description: Our most significant and successful implementations

descriptions.horilla: Modern open-source HR management system built with Python Django framework and advanced economic module integration. We specialize in comprehensive human resource management, automated payroll calculations, and advanced reporting. Our team created a specialized Slovak payroll module that precisely adheres to Slovak legislative requirements and automates the entire payroll accounting process.
descriptions.viacAkoNick: Mobile application for children's helpline developed with cutting-edge technologies - Flutter, Dart, PHP backend with native iOS and Android support. We created a secure communication platform where children and young people can seek help in difficult life situations. The application includes advanced security features, message encryption, and compliance with European child protection standards.
descriptions.lumturi: Sophisticated online auction platform built on WordPress framework with extended PHP backend. We created a complete ecosystem for auction trading with advanced features like real-time bidding, automatic notifications, secure payments, and detailed transaction history. The platform supports multiple product categories and provides intuitive user interface for both buyers and sellers.
descriptions.pixelCorporation: Advanced mobile application for iOS and Android developed in Expo and React Native with TypeScript architecture. Focused on the running community, the application includes GPS tracking, performance analysis, social features, and advanced statistics. We integrated machine learning algorithms for personalized training plans and created an engaging social platform for athletes of all levels.
descriptions.trulee: Modern progressive web application for online dating built with Next.js framework and mobile responsiveness. We created an intuitive algorithm for user matching, real-time chat system, video calls, and advanced security features. The application emphasizes quality connections over quantity and provides a safe environment for meeting new people.
descriptions.riseWeb: Full-featured corporate website for IT company developed in Next.js framework with modern design and advanced functionality. Features SEO optimization, fast loading, responsive design, CRM system integration, and advanced analytics tools. The website presents IT company professionalism and serves as an effective marketing tool for acquiring new clients.
descriptions.doucma: For six years, we taught computer science on this educational platform and utilized various IT technologies to improve the educational process. Our activities brought many satisfied students and clients who expanded their knowledge in computer science. We applied modern pedagogical approaches combined with technological solutions for more effective education.
descriptions.rozvojDopravy: Sophisticated web application for urban transportation optimization developed in Vue.js and Node.js with advanced visualization tools. The system analyzes traffic flows, generates intelligent charts and reports, and helps the city of Trnava optimize transportation infrastructure. Features real-time monitoring, predictive algorithms, and interactive dashboard for urban planners.
descriptions.twoRing: Long-term enterprise partnership for developing complex business applications in C#, SQL databases, and Vue.js frontend. We create scalable solutions for large corporations with emphasis on security, performance, and user-friendliness. Our collaboration includes continuous development, maintenance, and functionality expansion of enterprise systems for international markets.

reviews.name: Michael J.
reviews.content: RISE.SK is a reliable developer. I assigned tasks directly from the Kanban board and the team efficiently completed them. I highly recommend to anyone looking for a responsible partner.

reviews.name: Matej Š.
reviews.content: Thank you for quickly scheduling a consultation. RISE.SK helped me develop a website analysis tool – finally the project moved forward. 5/5!

reviews.name: Tomáš V.
reviews.content: SQL database training with RISE.SK was engaging and practical. They clearly explained advanced techniques, answered all questions and solved complex problems step by step. Now I feel much more confident working with SQL.

reviews.name: Timotej L.
reviews.content: I started with Python from scratch. RISE.SK quickly clarified the problem in a friendly atmosphere, the code suddenly worked and progress was immediate. I recommend to anyone who wants to master Python quickly and effectively.

reviews.name: Pavel K.
reviews.content: RISE.SK helped me a lot with a C project. Professional approach, clear explanation, perfect result. I recommend 5/5 ★.

reviews.name: René
reviews.content: I needed help with Python at work. RISE.SK set up a clear plan and the lessons were understandable and practical. I can only recommend the collaboration.

reviews.name: Jana G.
reviews.content: RISE.SK guided my son into programming in English. The lessons were always prepared, focused on his goals, and progress was visible with every session. I also appreciate the team's professional English.

reviews.name: Zuzana P.
reviews.content: I have programming tutoring with RISE.SK. Communication is seamless, they adapt to my schedule, explain everything, and make sure I try the solutions myself. Great support for developing practical skills.

reviews.name: Roman S.
reviews.content: I'm in my first year of university and RISE.SK tutors me in programming. They explain everything perfectly, are reliable and really know what they're doing.

reviews.name: Daniel K.
reviews.content: Professionalism at every step – RISE.SK managed to clearly explain every concept and answer all questions. Great tutoring, I recommend it.

items.question: What services do you provide?
items.answer: We provide comprehensive enterprise-grade software development services: modern web applications (React, Next.js 15, Nuxt.js), native & cross-platform mobile apps (React Native, Flutter, Swift, Kotlin), e-commerce solutions, custom software, AI/ML integrations, blockchain development, IoT solutions, API integrations, and strategic technology consulting. We specialize in cutting-edge technologies and are currently working on ISO 27001 and ISO 9001 certifications to ensure the highest quality standards.

items.question: How long does a typical project take?
items.answer: Project duration depends on complexity. Simple websites take 2-4 weeks, medium complexity applications take 6-12 weeks, and complex solutions take 3-6 months. We'll provide you with a precise timeline after analyzing your requirements.

items.question: What technologies do you work with?
items.answer: We work with the latest trending technologies: Frontend (React 18+, Next.js 15, Vue.js 3, Svelte, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn/ui), Backend (Node.js, Python, Go, Rust, Bun.js), Databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, Supabase, PlanetScale), Mobile (React Native, Expo, Flutter, Swift, Kotlin), AI/ML (OpenAI, LangChain, TensorFlow, PyTorch), Cloud (Vercel, AWS, Azure, Google Cloud), DevOps (Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, Terraform), and Blockchain (Ethereum, Solana, Web3). We stay updated with the latest tech trends and continuously adopt new technologies that provide value to our clients.

items.question: How do you determine project pricing?
items.answer: We calculate prices based on project complexity, number of features, technologies used, and time requirements. We provide transparent price quotes with cost breakdowns. We also offer fixed pricing for clearly defined projects.

items.question: What's included in the price?
items.answer: The price includes complete development, testing, application deployment, basic training, documentation, and 30-day free support after launch. Maintenance and extensions are handled separately by agreement.

items.question: What are your payment terms?
items.answer: We accept payments in the form of deposits (30% upon contract signing, 40% mid-project, 30% upon completion) or monthly payments for long-term projects. Invoices are due within 14 days.

items.question: Do you work with existing systems?
items.answer: Yes, we have extensive experience with integration into existing systems, data migration, legacy application modernization, and third-party API integrations.

items.question: How do you handle data security?
items.answer: Security is our top priority. We implement enterprise-grade security measures: HTTPS with modern TLS protocols, zero-trust architecture, multi-factor authentication, end-to-end encryption, secure APIs with rate limiting, GDPR & CCPA compliance, regular penetration testing, security audits, and SOC 2 compliance processes. We are actively working on ISO 27001 certification to ensure the highest international security standards. All our developers follow secure coding practices and regular security training.

items.question: Can you scale our solution?
items.answer: Absolutely! We design all applications with scalability at their core using modern cloud-native architectures. Our solutions utilize microservices, serverless functions, auto-scaling infrastructure, CDNs, advanced caching strategies, database optimization, and monitoring systems. We implement horizontal and vertical scaling strategies that can handle millions of users. Our experience includes applications serving 100,000+ concurrent users with 99.9% uptime guarantees.

items.question: How does communication work during the project?
items.answer: We communicate regularly via email, Slack, or Teams. We organize weekly status meetings, provide access to project management tools, and regular demo versions.

items.question: Do you provide maintenance after completion?
items.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive maintenance packages tailored to your needs: basic technical support, complete service with new features, performance monitoring, security updates, backup management, 24/7 monitoring, bug fixes, and feature enhancements. Our maintenance includes proactive monitoring, automated backups, security patches, performance optimization, and monthly reports. We also provide emergency support and SLA guarantees.

items.question: Do you work with AI and Machine Learning?
items.answer: Yes! We're at the forefront of AI/ML development. We build custom AI solutions using OpenAI GPT models, LangChain, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Hugging Face. Our AI services include chatbots, content generation, data analysis, computer vision, natural language processing, recommendation systems, and AI-powered automation. We also integrate with popular AI APIs and create custom machine learning models tailored to your business needs.

items.question: What about ISO certifications and quality standards?
items.answer: We are actively pursuing ISO 27001 (Information Security Management) and ISO 9001 (Quality Management) certifications to ensure international standards of quality and security. Our development processes follow industry best practices including GDPR compliance, SOC 2 frameworks, and secure development lifecycle (SDLC). We maintain detailed documentation, quality assurance processes, and regular third-party audits to ensure the highest standards.

items.question: Can you help with digital transformation?
items.answer: Absolutely! We specialize in complete digital transformation initiatives. This includes legacy system modernization, cloud migration, process automation, API development, data migration, system integrations, workflow optimization, and staff training. We help businesses transition from outdated systems to modern, scalable, and efficient digital solutions that improve productivity and reduce costs.

items.question: Do you sign NDAs?
items.answer: Of course, we routinely sign NDAs (non-disclosure agreements) before starting collaboration. Your business information and know-how are safe with us.
